import { useRef, useState } from "react" function AddWords ( {onSubmit} ) { const [formData, setFormData] = useState() const inputRef = useRef() const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }) } const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault() const { department, lesson, cn, eng, example} = formData onSubmit(department, lesson, cn, eng, example) console.log(evt.target) inputRef.value = '' } return (

Add new word

) } export default AddWords
